category: Other Disease of Public Health Importance

case_definition.suspected: Any person with fever, cough, shortness of breath, or sudden loss of taste/smell and with a relevant travel or contact history.
case_definition.probable: A suspected case with inconclusive testing or link to confirmed case and typical symptoms.
case_definition.confirmed: Detection of SARS-CoV-2 via RT-PCR or approved diagnostic test.

public_health_actions: Notify NCDC and conduct contact tracing
